name: saucedemo-playwright
author: PaulSC
description: Automatizaci√≥n con Playwright + Cucumber + POM sobre SauceDemo

scripts.test: npm run clean && cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/*.ts --require src/support/**/*.ts src/features --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json
scripts.test:chromium: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm run test:base
scripts.test:chromium:tag: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=chromium npm run test:tag --
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm run test:base
scripts.test:firefox:tag: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=firefox npm run test:tag --
scripts.test:webkit: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm run test:base
scripts.test:webkit:tag: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=webkit npm run test:tag --
scripts.test:allRemote: npm run test:chromium:tag -- @SauceDemo && npm run test:firefox:tag -- @SauceDemo && npm run test:webkit:tag -- @SauceDemo
scripts.test:allLocal: npm run test:chromium:tag -- @SauceDemo && npm run test:firefox:tag -- @SauceDemo
scripts.test:base: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/*.ts --require src/support/**/*.ts src/features --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json
scripts.test:tag: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/step-definitions/**/*.ts --require src/support/**/*.ts src/features --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --tags
